name: Psychotic
description:
Description

Take control of an abducted astronaut with psychic powers. Slice, crush, blast, and explode aliens as you escape captivity and discover how you gained these psychic powers while finding out the fate of your crewmates in this 2D side-scroller.

Credits Programming
